bioghist.p: Benjamin Martin lived in Philadelphia and died in 1845. His son, also named Benjamin, was executor of the estate.

scopecontent.p: This is a receipt book for dispersals from the estate of Thomas Martin, 1845-1871. The volume lists payments of inheritance to Martin's heirs, and includes receipts for those payments signed by each heir. There is also a very brief family history of Benjamin Martin.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
